Taken: o.a. opzetten (landelijk) werkblad en procedure voor beoordeling.

Project manager International Accreditations at Nijmegen School of Management

profile_positions.description: As project manager International Accreditations at Nijmegen School of Management, I am working on the NVAO & AACSB re-accreditations for our BSc-, MSc-, and executive programmes in Business Administration, Economics and Business economics.
profile_positions.title: Project manager International Accreditations

profile_positions.description: I'm teaching the course Professional Skills for Psychologists (PSP), which is part of the Bachelor's programme Psychology. This is a practicum in which students are trained in various professional skills used by psychologists in different fields of work, i.e. interview skills, test-taking skills, writing psychological reports, self-reflection and presentation skills.
profile_positions.title: Teacher Professional Skills for Psychologists

profile_positions.description: Main project: the establishment of a faculty admissions office in which the admission and selection processes of all Bachelor's, Pre-master's and Master's programmes are arranged. As coordinator of this Admissions Office Social Sciences (AOSS), my tasks include managing our team of admissions officers, monitoring all processes and outcomes, identifying bottlenecks and writing short policy notes. Since AOSS is operational, I now also manage other projects, such as the academic language proficienct test and the digitalisation of internship and thesis processes in OSIRIS.
profile_positions.title: Project leader Faculty of Social Sciences

profile_positions.description: De afdeling Strategie, Onderwijs en Onderzoek (SOO) ondersteunt het college van bestuur en de faculteiten bij strategie- en beleidsontwikkeling op het gebied van onderwijs en onderzoek en de ontwikkeling van managementinformatie ter ondersteuning van dit beleid. Vanuit een detacheringsovereenkomst was ik gedurende een jaar werkzaam op deze RU-brede beleidsafdeling. Als projectmedewerker was ik betrokken bij een drietal projecten: 1. de coördinatie en implementatie van een universiteitsbrede toets academische taalvaardigheid; 2. de verbetering van toelatings- en selectiebeleid; 3. de ontwikkeling van een nieuw RU-opleidingenregister.
profile_positions.title: Projectmedewerker Onderwijsbeleid

profile_positions.description: Coordinator of the recruitment, admission and selection process for the bachelor's programmes in Psychology and Artificial Intelligence at Radboud University Nijmegen. Furthermore: the marketing of our programmes, contacts with and integration of international students, and research & policy making to improve these processes.
profile_positions.title: Coordinator Recruitment, Admissions & Selection for Psychology and Artificial Intelligence

profile_positions.description: Coordinator Internationalisation for the Department of Psychology and Artificial Intelligence at Radboud University Nijmegen. My tasks consisted of guiding/ advising Psychology students on studying abroad (which country, university, field in Psychology, etc.), adjudicating study plans, signing agreements with other (international) universities, grade conversion and policy making to improve these processes. My goal was to optimise the internationalisation policy and -processes for my department and find the best balance between quantity (enhancing the numbers of incoming- and outgoing students) and quality (of foreign education and bilateral agreements/ partner universities).
profile_positions.title: Coordinator Internationalisation Psychology

profile_positions.description:
Simultaneously to the function mentioned above (0.6 fte), I worked as a researcher at the Behavioural Science Institute of Radboud University Nijmegen (0.4 fte). This on the project "Participation with movement restriction: tailor made training and coaching". See www.meedoenmetsport.nl for more information. 

I was coordinator of Work Package 2: Optimising the context for sport participation for children with Cerbral Palsy and DCD. This line of research was aimed at examining the expertise and competency of professionals on training and coaching of children with CP and DCD in schools and at sport clubs. This with the aim to improve the competency of sport coaches and physical activity teachers, and optimisation of the context for sport participation among children with CP and DCD. 

Studied were, to what extent and in which way implicit- and explicit learning strategies are being used by sport coaches and physical activity teachers, and which experiences both professionals and children have during the use of both strategies. Besides that, the interaction between the sport professional and the child was investigated, which also included the behaviour of both target groups. The focus was on unravelling the meaning that both professionals and children give to the way the sport trainer/ PA-teacher interacts with the children.
profile_positions.title: Researcher Behavioural Science Institute

profile_positions.company: RIVM National Institute for Public Health and the Environment
profile_positions.description:
The Centre for Healthy Living is part of the RIVM. RIVM is the Netherlands' National Institute for Public Health and the Environment. RIVM is a leading centre of expertise in the fields of health, nutrition and environmental protection. It is an agency of the Dutch Ministry of Health, Welfare and Sport. 

At the RIVM Centre for Healthy Living I worked on the delivery of efficient and effective local health promotion in the Netherlands. We promoted the use of the most appropriate lifestyle interventions by clearly presenting available interventions, planning instruments, communication materials and links to relevant Dutch knowledge and support organisations on www.loketgezondleven.nl. The project I worked on, concerned assessing the quality, efficiency and coherence of health promotion interventions. We continually consulted with health promotion professionals to take into account their needs and wishes. Our goal was to contribute to the health of all Dutch citizens by supporting health promotion professionals with a website and direct support (meetings, training, coaching).
profile_positions.title: Advisor Quality of Youth Interventions

profile_positions.description: During three months, I developed a monitoring- and evaluation system for the Olympic Youth Development Centre in Lusaka, Zambia (see http://www.oydc.org.zm/). This with the goal to measure the effects of the different sport- and life style programmes given at the centre. I also conducted data analyses and -reports, trained the employees of the 'Monitoring and Evaluation Unit' in continuing using the monitoring- and evaluation system after my departure, and advised the OYDC-board & the International Olympic Committee (IOC) on effectiveness of the OYDC-programmes and processes & policy at the OYDC. A very inspiring and rewarding time!
profile_positions.title: Researcher

profile_positions.description:
Through my employer at that time (the Knowledge Centre for Sport and Physical Activity), I was invited to participate in the European Youth Sport Forum 2012. This EU-forum is for sharing knowledge and experiences between young sport leaders throughout Europe. The Forum was held from 25-11 until 1-12 at Larnaca, Cyprus, and approximately 100 participants from 28 countries were represented. The three key topics were Health, Volunteering and Participation. 

Besides being an active participant, I volunteered for being a member of the Editorial Group. This Editorial Group writes the declaration and recommendations for the EU-council. On the final day, I was one of the three sport leaders that presented our declaration and recommendations to EU-delegates. Also, I am selected as co-coordinator of the “Futures Group”, which has the task to follow up the actions of the Declaration.
profile_positions.title: Participant and member of the Editorial Group, Cyprus

company.name: Knowledge Centre for Sport and Physical Activity

profile_positions.company: Knowledge Centre for Sport and Physical Activity
profile_positions.description: At the Knowledge Centre for Sport and Physical Activity, I worked as an adviser and researcher on the programmes Effective Active and Sport & Depression. For Effective Active I validated and enriched sport and physical activity projects throughout the Netherlands. For the programme Sport & Depression I developed a Lifestyle Intervention for people with depressive symptoms and I was involved in the research into the implementation and (cost)effectiveness of this intervention in primary care.
profile_positions.title: Advisor and researcher

profile_positions.description:
Developer, adviser and researcher of SportMpower. SportMpower is an educational & sport programme for children who are at risk for early school leaving. I developed the programme, which got implemented in four Dutch cities and was part of the team that conducted a 1,5 year effectiveness study, which was subsidised by the Dutch Ministry of Health, Welfare and Sport. My tasks also included the national recruitment, implementation and coordination of the different SportMpower projects.

At Kennispraktijk I was also involved in research in the fields of sport, education and health, e.g. local sport policy, acquirement of social competencies through sport, the mental, social and physical effects of practising sport, monitoring the outcomes of neighbourhood sport coaches, etc.
profile_positions.title: Advisor SportMpower and researcher

profile_positions.description: At this secondary school I worked as a child psychologist on the programme Dubbel Doel (Double Target). I developed this educational & sport programme to prevent youngsters from early school leaving. Additionally, I did the coordination, monitoring and research of this project. Later, at Kennispraktijk, I developed this programme into a national programme.
profile_positions.title: Child Psychologist

profile_positions.description: During my studies, I worked at 't Heuveleind as a pedagogical social worker for children with psychiatric disorders.
profile_positions.title: Pedagogical social worker

profile_positions.description: During my studies, I worked at Het Kinderkwartier as a pedagogical social worker for children with severe and complex psychiatric disorders.
profile_positions.title: Pedagogical social worker
